game_description: Immerse yourself in our learning experience that allows you to create questions about any kind of subject. A fun synchronous learning lab on VictoryXR’s multiplayer platform.
review_1: The game feels pretty good, but there still are some bugs that need to be worked on; currently, the tutorial button does nothing, and it's possible to glitch through the bottom of the map and be stuck in an endless void, as there is no menu function once in the game, so you can only shut it down and restart. Very nice environment design, you can interact with a fair bit of props, which is nice, the lasers from your hand help make it clear which answer you're selecting, and choosing an incorrect answer just respawns you, so not terribly punishing
review_2: My students enjoyed the experience. It’s a great way for them to retain knowledge.
